text: I’m experiencing the same problem in terms of elements not being rendered until you change one of the default values (in my case right now, I’ve got 6 elements in a repeater, it’s only rendering 3, and if I change the alt tag of one of the images, re-renders w/ all 6) . It’s almost like some weird sort of caching, because a few minute ago, I legitimately had the defaults limited to 3
